00375     class Ctx {
00376     public:
00377         Ctx();
00378         ~Ctx();
00380         I32 arg_len() {
00381             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00382         }
00384         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00385             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00386             this->register_allocated(s);
00387             return s;
00388         }
00390         void ret(Scalar s) {
00391             this->ret(0, &s);
00392         }
00393         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00394             this->ret(0, s);
00395         }
00396         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00397             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00398         }
00400         bool wantarray() {
00401             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00402         }
00404         void ret(Array* ary) {
00405             unsigned int size = ary->size();
00406             if (size != 0) {
00407                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00408                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < size) {
00409                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, size);
00410                 }
00411 
00412                 for (unsigned int i=0; i < size; ++i) {
00413                     Scalar * s = ary->fetch(i);
00414                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = s->val;
00415                 }
00416                 ax--;
00417             } else {
00418                 this->return_undef();
00419             }
00420         }
00422         void return_true() {
00423             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00424         }
00426         void return_undef() {
00427             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00428         }
00434         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00435             allocated.push_back(v);
00436         }
00437     protected:
00442         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00443             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00444         }
00445         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00446             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00447         }
00448         I32 ax;
00449         SV ** mark;
00450         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00451     };
00452     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00453     Ctx::Ctx() {
00454         // same as dAXMARK
00455         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00456         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00457         this->mark = PL_stack_base + ax - 1;
00458 
00459         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00460     }
00461     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00462         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00463         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00464             delete *iter;
00465         }
00466 
00467         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00468 
00469         ctxstack.pop_back();
00470     }

00488     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00489         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00490         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00491         if (v) {
00492             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00493             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00494             return ref;
00495         } else {
00496             return NULL;
00497         }
00498     }
00499     Reference * Array::fetch(I32 key) {
00500         SV ** v = av_fetch((AV*)this->val, key, 0);
00501         if (v) {
00502             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00503             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00504             return ref;
00505         } else {
00506             return NULL;
00507         }
00508     }

00521     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00522         _v->refcnt_inc();
00523         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00524         if (v) {
00525             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00526             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00527             return ref;

00571     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00572     public:
00573         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00574             xs_version_bootcheck();
00575         }
00576         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00577             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00578             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00579         }
00580     protected:
00581         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00582         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00583             SV *_sv;
00584             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00585             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00586                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00587                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00588             } else {
00589                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00590                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00591                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00592                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00593                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00594                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00595             }
00596             if (_sv) {
00597                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00598                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00599                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00600                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00601                 }
00602                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00603                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00604                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00605                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00606                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00607                 }
00608             }
00609         }
00610     };
00611 
00615     class Code : public Scalar {
00616     public:
00617         Code(SV * _s) : Scalar(_s) { }
00619         void call(Array * args, Array* retval) {
00620             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00621 
00622             push_scope(); // ENTER
00623             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00624             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00625 
00626             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00627                 markstack_grow();
00628             }
00629             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00630 
00631             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00632                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00633                     // optimize?
00634                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00635                 }
00636                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00637             }
00638             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00639 
00640             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_ARRAY);
00641 
00642             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00643 
00644             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00645                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00646                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00647                 retval->store(i, s);
00648             }
00649 
00650             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00651             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00652                 free_tmps();
00653             }
00654             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00655         }
00657         void call(Array * args, Scalar** retval) {
00658             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00659 
00660             push_scope(); // ENTER
00661             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00662             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00663 
00664             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00665                 markstack_grow();
00666             }
00667             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00668 
00669             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00670                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00671                     // optimize?
00672                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00673                 }
00674                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00675             }
00676             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00677 
00678             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_SCALAR);
00679 
00680             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00681 
00682             if (count != 0) {
00683                 *retval = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00684                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(*retval);
00685             }
00686 
00687             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00688             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00689                 free_tmps();
00690             }
00691             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00692         }
00693     };

00698     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00699     public:
00700         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00702         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00703             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00704                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00705             } else {
00706                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00707             }
00708         }

00713         template <class T>
00714         T extract() {
00715             return INT2PTR(T, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00716         }
00717     };

00722     class Carp {
00723     public:
00724         static void croak(const char * format, ...) {
00725             va_list args;
00726             va_start(args, format);
00727             Perl_vcroak(aTHX_ format, &args);
00728             va_end(args);
00729         }
00730         static void warn(const char * format, ...) {
00731             va_list args;
00732             va_start(args, format);
00733             Perl_vwarn(aTHX_ format, &args);
00734             va_end(args);
00735         }
00736     };

00742     class FileTest {
00743     public:
00748         static bool is_regular_file(const char * fname) {
00749             Stat_t buf;
00750             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00751             if (ret == 0 && S_ISREG(buf.st_mode)) {
00752                 return true;
00753             } else {
00754                 return false;
00755             }
00756         }
00761         static bool is_dir(const char * fname) {
00762             Stat_t buf;
00763             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00764             if (ret == 0 && S_ISDIR(buf.st_mode)) {
00765                 return true;
00766             } else {
00767                 return false;
00768             }
00769         }
00770     };

00776     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00777         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00778             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00779             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00780             return s;
00781         } else {
00782             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00783                 "Devel::BindPP",
00784                 "sv");
00785         }
00786     }

00851     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00852         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00853             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00854             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00855             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00856             return hobj;
00857         } else {
00858             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00859                 "Devel::BindPP",
00860                 "hv");
00861         }
00862     }
00863     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00864         SV* v = this->val;
00865         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00866             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00867             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00868             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00869             return obj;
00870         } else {
00871             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00872                 "Devel::BindPP",
00873                 "av");
00874         }
00875     }
00876     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00877         SV* v = this->val;
00878         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00879             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00880             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00881             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00882             return obj;
00883         } else {
00884             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00885                 "Devel::BindPP",
00886                 "sv");
00887         }
00888     }
00889     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00890         SV* v = this->val;
00891         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00892             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00893             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00894             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00895             return obj;
00896         } else {
00897             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00898                 "Devel::BindPP",
00899                 "sv");
00900         }
00901     }
00902 
00903     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00904         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00905         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00906         return ref;
00907     }
00908     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00909         value->refcnt_inc();
00910         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00911         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00912         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00913         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00914         return ref;
00915     }
00916     Scalar* Hash::scalar() {
00917         Scalar*s = new Scalar(hv_scalar((HV*)this->val));
00918         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00919         return s;
00920     }
00921     void Hash::undef() {
00922         hv_undef((HV*)this->val);
00923     }
00924     void Hash::clear() {
00925         hv_clear((HV*)this->val);
00926     }
00927     Boolean* Boolean::yes() {
00928         Boolean* s = new Boolean(true);
00929         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00930         return s;
00931     }
00932     Boolean* Boolean::no() {
00933         Boolean* s = new Boolean(false);
00934         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00935         return s;
00936     }
